lyrics:
13 contributorsthe turn lyricsverse 1
i dont read yeah i just guess
as the world turns

verse 2

your loving turns to less

verse 3
i learn by mistakes
most of it is yours and
im done living life as a criminal
and i thought id die young just to please the old
now i teach the young im vitriol

id rather go on
go up and down
turn myself all around
then to stay down

then to stay down
see mia liveget tickets as low as 146you might also likeverse 4

its hard enough to get more

just to let my head blow
